metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23215 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An integer overflow leading to a heap-buffer overflow was found in theDwaCompressor of OpenEXR in versions before 3.0.1. An attacker could usethis flaw to crash an application compiled with OpenEXR.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.7
openexr - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.7
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: openexr package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1.7').
